A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely ignored what the original films strive to create. They turn Han back into smuggling loser and Luke into a winy old man. Surprised they didn't throw the whole \"but i was going to go to Tosche station to pick up some power converters\" line in. Disney is to Star Wars as Michael Bay is to Transformers. I'm as big of a fan of Star Wars as anyone\, but truly will have to think about going to see them slaughter this epic story a third time... they're crushing my childhood.
